attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our boys should not be out there its a lost cause. I'd do anything to have my fiance home as would anyone else who has a son, daughter, husband or friend out in iraq or afghanistan. Please lets do something for them! GET THEM HOME were they belong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
